mapper.select: SELECT asfh.id, asfh.project_id, asfh.organization_id, asfh.url, asfh.file_name, asfh.creation_date, asfh.status FROM agile_static_file_header asfh LEFT JOIN agile_issue_static_file_rel asfir ON asfir.static_file_id = asfh.id AND asfir.issue_id = #{issueId} WHERE asfh.project_id = #{projectId} AND asfh.status = 'success' AND asfir.id IS NULL

SELECT id, project_id, organization_id, url, file_name, status, creation_date FROM agile_static_file_header asfh WHERE asfh.project_id = #{projectId} AND asfh.status != 'doing' AND asfh.id in ( SELECT asfir.static_file_id FROM agile_issue_static_file_rel asfir WHERE asfir.issue_id = #{issueId} AND asfir.project_id = #{projectId})
